deactivation.description: Press 'Discard changes' to discard your changes and navigate to the new site or press 'Cancel' to stay on this site.
deactivation.title: You have unsaved changes!

entry-name.deleted: This entry has been deleted. Restore an old version in its history or edit the deleted entry to restore it.

404.description: The page you requested could not be found. Please try reloading the page. If this problem persists: Please contact the support. You can use your browsers Back button to navigate to the page you have previously come from or navigate to the start-page by pressing the button below.
404.title: Page Not Found!

file-preview.browser-no-preview: Your browser doesn't support this file type. You can download it and try to open it on your computer.

xss-confirm.description: We are not able to check wether this file could perform an XSS-Attack when being displayed in the browser. Click the button below if you are sure you can trust this file.

download.body: Currently we are not scanning uploaded files for malicious code that could affect a clients computer when downloaded. Only download this file if you trust its creator.
download.title: Download

files-buttons.preview: Open a preview of this file

changelog.description: Here you can find all our update notes.

faq.description: Find the answers to frequently asked questions here.

features.description: You don't know what you can do with this website? - Look here for a pitch and feature list.

licenses.description: This software depends on multiple open source projects which legally require their license to be included in all their copies. They do not have access to any user information at all. We want to thank each programmer who was involved in the creation of these libraries without which this software wouldn't be possible.

support.description: Here you can find our contact information for individual support or reporting a bug.

description.1: If you or your company are missing a feature please let us know over
description.2: We are constantly developing exciting new features and are always happy for input. Nevertheless be aware that some new functionalities will take a long time to implement correctly and sometimes they are even out of our softwares scope.

general-contact.1: If you don't know how to do something with our software or have a question, please check our
general-contact.2: first. If you don't find anything helpful in there you can always contact us via
general-contact.3: . We wil try to come back to you with a response as soon as possible.

support.intro: We believe that user-software should be intuitive with no need of explanation. But in reality this not always possible.

description.1: If you think you have found a software bug please report it to
description.2: Most of the time the following information will be helpful for us:
description.3: Bug reports will be handled directly by the responsible developer team.

report-bug.report-error: The error message that is shown. Please remove any sensitive information from the error message before you send it to us.
report-bug.report-media: Screenshots, a short video or gif of the unwanted behaviour. You can create screenshots by pressing {{ windows }} on Windows or  {{ mac }} on MAC and snipping the wanted part.
report-bug.report-reproduction: A brief explanation on how to reproduce the behavior.

report-url.1: The URL of the current page you encounter the error, like
report-url.2: . Please check that you don't send any sensitive information to us.

report-bug.title: Report a bug

help.description: Here you can find some helpful tipps on how to use this software like our changelog, the faq or how to contact our support for individual help or to report a bug.

projects.description: Here you can find an overview of all your projects. In a project you can e.g. create, edit or search for entries and tables.

scanner.description: Scan QR-codes from entries and see their values.

user-profile.description: Change personal settings like your name, language or email.

default-increment.description: Wether a unique value for this field should be automatically generated. (Useful for e.g. an id)
default-increment.name: Automatic identifier generation

compatible.description: You don't have to use a special device or operating system to use our software. It runs on your desktop, your tablet or your mobile without any trouble. The only requirement is a recent browser.
compatible.title: Compatible for your needs

customer-disclaimer.1: This website is intended exclusively for employees of the following organization
customer-disclaimer.2: You can find our official public website at

end.questions: If you got any questions you can contact us here:
end.title: Still not convinced?

i18n.cto: There is an essential language you would need missing? Contact us
i18n.description: You are an international company with many employees all around the globe? Don't worry! We support multiple languages.
i18n.title: Internationalization

top.link: Already have an account? Click here to login.
top.subtitle:
Bring order to your data -
Simple & futureproof

updates.description: Experience quick and uncomplicated support and regular updates which constantly bring enhancements and new features.
updates.title: Always on the safe side

error.body: We had an issue while processing your request. If this error persists, please contact the support.
error.title: There was a error while authenticating!

logout.body: You can login again at any time.
logout.title: You got logged out successfully!

email-success.body: We have sent instructions on how to change your authentication email adress to your current authentication email adress.
email-success.title: Email sent!

email-success.body: We have sent instructions on how to reset your password to your authentication email adress.
email-success.title: Email sent!

invalid.body: Your link is invalid, please try again!
invalid.title: Invalid link

default.body: We had an issue while processing your request. If this error persists, please contact the support.
default.title: Error!

linkCopied.body: You can now paste it in e.g. an email.
linkCopied.title: Link successfully copied to clipboard!

officially-only-german.body: The presence of the English translation is currently only to be understood as a preview of the functionality of the final product.
officially-only-german.title: This website is currently only targeted at German-speaking visitors!

content-error.body: You have either not the needed permissions or the QR-Code is invalid.
content-error.title: Error by displaying the results

url-error.body: If you are certain this QR-Code is from one of our labels: Please contact the support.
url-error.title: Invalid QR-Code

shared-worker-fallback.body: Your browser doesn't support SharedWorker. A fallback is used instead, but the app won't synchronize between multiple open tabs. We suggest the most recent version of Chrome or Firefox on desktop or Firefox on mobile.
shared-worker-fallback.title: Some features might be missing...

update-available.body: The new Version has already been downloaded in the background and just needs to be installed. Please reload the page.
update-available.title: A new Update is available

email-success.body: We have sent an email with a verification link to the specified email adress.
email-success.title: Verification email has been send

change-success.body: Remember to use the new authentication email to login again.
change-success.title: Authentication email changed successfully!

invalid.body: Please request another authentication email change link.
invalid.title: This link is invalid!

version-missmatch.body: The version of the service-worker is different from the one of the tab-client. Please close all tabs of this website and restart your browser. Should this message appear again, please contact the support.
version-missmatch.title: Version missmatch

repair-warning.body: That's probably because an attribute has been deleted from the table.
repair-warning.title: Repaired a column order

delete-success-message.body: You can restore this entry at any time.
delete-success-message.title: Entry successfully deleted.

delete.description: This entry won't show up on normal searches anymore. You are able to restore it after it's deletion. But be advised: all relations will have to be restored manually!
delete.title: Do you really want to delete this entry?

edit-success-message.body: The changes have been added to it's history.
edit-success-message.title: Entry successfully edited.

advanced-mode.descriptions: If the advanced mode is activated you are able to create filters for metadata too. You can therefore search for deleted or invalidated versions.

filter.get-all-versions: Get all versions of all entries

invalid-expression.description: This Expression is not valid anymore. Probably because it's attribute has been removed. Please remove it.

confirmation.description: This action will create a new version with the values of the chosen one.
confirmation.description-foreign: This action will create a new version with the values of the chosen one. Changed relations will not be restored.
confirmation.title: Do you really want to restore this version?

restore.body: This creates a new version of this entry with the values of this one. So no data gets lost in the process.
restore.name: Restore

overview.copyLink: Copy the (shortened) link of this page

create-similar-entry.body: After duplicating this entry, you can still make changes before saving the new entry. Files are not copied.

label.body: We generate for each entry a qr-code that links directly to this site. You can e.g. print it and put it on the item whose values are stored here. Scan it with your smartphone via your preferred qr-scanner app or our own qr-code scanner.
label.name: Label

faq.submit-question: If you have another question, please contact us via

no-projects-yet.text: You have not a member in any projects yet. Get invited by a project admin or create your own.

create.description: Create a new entry in this table
create.title: New

search.description: Search for entries in this table
search.title: Search

table-views-editor.add-attribute: Add an attribute that should be visible
table-views-editor.drag-attribute: Drag to change the attribute order
table-views-editor.min-ordered-attributes-error: At least 1 attribute must be visible.

confirm-foreign-save.description:
The counterpart for this foreign attribute will be created only after this table has been saved.

If you have made changes you don't want to save: press "Cancel", revert these changes and save the table then.

Don't forget to set correct names and validators for the new attributes.
confirm-foreign-save.title: Save your changes to finish the creation

confirmAttributeDeletion.description: Your changes have removed at least one attribute. This would also delete all saved values for this attribute permanently. You cannot reverse this action. Do you really want to save these changes?
confirmAttributeDeletion.title: Saving would permanently delete an attribute

confirmDeletion.description: Do you really want to delete this table? You can not revert this action!
confirmDeletion.title: Delete table

create-foreign-attribute-modal.choose-foreign-tableId: Please choose a table from the graph below. The so created relation connects the currently open table with the chosen one.
create-foreign-attribute-modal.title: Choose the table to connect with...

displayProperties.minimum-languages: You need to add at least one language

tablesEditor.drag-attribute: Change the order of the attributes by dragging them

edit.description: Choose the table to edit by clicking on its name in the graph above
edit.title: Edit a Table

foreign-save-invalid.description:
The counterpart for this foreign attribute will be created only after this table has been saved.

The form is currently invalid. Please press "Cancel" correct it's values and save it.

Don't forget to set correct names and validators for the new attributes.
foreign-save-invalid.title: Save your changes to finish the creation

new.description: Click here or on an empty section of the graph above.
new.title: Create a new Table

tablesEditor.noAttributes: A table needs at least one attribute

table-graph.empty: There are no tables created in this project yet. To create a new table fill out and save the form below. The newly created table will be displayed in the tables-graph here.
table-graph.indicator-info: This is the graph for changing the table-structure
table-graph.save: Click here to save the position of the table on the graph

routing.entry-overview-description: A complete overview of the values and meta-data of the entry
routing.general-settings-descriptions: Change general settings of this project
routing.history-description: The full version history of this entry
routing.overview-description: Choose a table and create, search and edit entries
routing.settings-members-descriptions: Invite new users and change roles and permissions of the members

errors.no-permission: Unable to access video stream. Please make sure you have a webcam enabled and given our application the correct access rights in the browser.

scanner.nothing-scanned-yet: Scann the QR-Code label of an entry...

efficient-workflow.description: Our user interface is designed so that you can work quickly and reliably. For example, if you need to create several similar entries, you can simply duplicate the first entry by pressing a button and only need to change the corresponding values.
efficient-workflow.title: Workflow oriented

export.description: An export of tables as CSV and JSON files is planned. This will especially offer the possibility to migrate data from the KoppaDb system to other data processing solutions.
export.title: File export

files-search.description: It should be possible to filter by file name and the text content of a file. Supported are text files, PDF files and images where the text is determined by optical character recognition.
files-search.title: Search for files

files.description: It is also possible to upload arbitrary files. These can then not only be downloaded, but (depending on the browser) also be displayed directly in KoppaDb. For the preview images, videos, audio, text, PDF and Markdown files are supported. A preview for Excel files is under development.
files.title: File attributes

foreign-search.description: It should also be possible to include relation attributes in the search.
foreign-search.title: Search with relations

hidden-attributes.description: You have attributes that exist only for historical reasons and are no longer actively used? You can simply hide them by default without losing their values.
hidden-attributes.title: Hidden attributes

history.description: Every change or deletion of an entry is stored in an easily understandable history. This prevents unintentional loss of information.
history.title: Full version history

labels.description: For each entry we generate a label with a QR code that refers to the corresponding entry. This label can be printed out and attached to the corresponding product. By scanning it, you can access all your important information in a flash.
labels.title: Labels

markdown.description: Formatted texts can be created and saved using an integrated editor. It is not necessary to understand the underlying formatting language "Markdown".
markdown.title: Markdown

permissions.description: It should be possible to adjust which project members have access to which tables via a group-based rights system.
permissions.title: Permissions

planned-features.description: The following functions are envisioned and are at different stages of planning and implementation. In each case, no ETA is available yet.
planned-features.title: Planned features

relations.description: Relations connect entries from tables with each other. Simple relations are supported, which only consist of a selection field, but also complex relations, where intermediate attributes in the relation itself can be used to store additional data.
relations.title: Relations

table-views.description: A table is used by several employees, for each of whom only a handful of attributes are relevant? - Each member can set their own attribute order and even hide attributes.
table-views.title: Table views

tables-graph.description: Tables and their relationships to each other are clearly displayed in the tables graph. It is also used for navigation. Project members can mark frequently used tables as favourites and thus visually highlight them for themselves.
tables-graph.title: Tables graph

validators.description: Validators can be used to reduce input errors. There are different validators for each attribute type, e.g. you can set minimum and maximum values for numbers or limit files to certain file types. The error messages are generated in real time as values are filled in.
validators.title: Validators

display-pitch.case-0: you are a company, club or other organization based in Germany
display-pitch.case-1: folders full of Excel spreadsheets are no longer enough for you.
display-pitch.case-2: most of your team members have little programming skills and computer science knowledge.
display-pitch.case-3: you want to save your data (gradually) digitally ordered.
display-pitch.case-4: you want to rely on a futureproof solution for your valuable data.
display-pitch.title: KoppaDb is just right for you if...

1.pre-button: Register easily and free of charge
1.title: Register

2.description: All projects are independent of each other and are characterized by their members, table structure and stored data.
2.title: Create project

3.description: Tables specify the structure in which the data is to be stored. Attributes are the columns of the table. The type of attribute determines whether, for example, numbers, words, time data or files should be in a column.
3.title: Create table

4.description: Invite additional members to your project. You can give them different access rights.
4.title: Invite Members

5.description: Based on the previously defined table structure, a form is generated which all employees can now use to create, edit or delete entries.
5.title: Insert data

6.description: You can also search for all entries. Searches with complex filters are possible too.
6.title: Search for entries

7.description: In reality, there are constantly new developments that require other attributes. Since one can adapt the table structure oneself at any time via the user interface, one avoids delays or misunderstandings due to cumbersome communication with the IT department or programmers who have no domain knowledge.
7.title: Adapt the tables to new requirements

advantages.3: We take care of maintenance and safety
advantages.4: High availability by using the Amazon web services infrastructure

cloud.individual-instance: Own isolated KoppaDb instance on an individual domain
cloud.title: Cloud

advantages.3: No software limitation in terms of storage space, number of projects or entries

contact.pre: If you are interested please contact us via

on-premise.data-migration: Consulting or development of data migration solutions: individual arrangement
on-premise.description: You want to run KoppaDb on your own company server? Then this is the right option. Your data are thus physically only visible for yourself.

single-license.minimum-volume: At least {{ minVolume }} must be purchased

on-premise.title: On Premise

errors.only-one-email-verified: You must have more than one email verified to change your authentication email.
errors.token: The provided link is invalid. Please request another authentication email change link.

not-removable-email.authentication-email: You cannot remove your authentication email.
not-removable-email.notification-email: You cannot remove your notification email.
not-removable-email.public-email: You cannot remove your public email.

request-auth-email-change.description: The authentication email is the email you need to login into your account. Click the button below and an email is send to the following email address:
request-auth-email-change.min-emails-error: To change your authentication email you must have at least two verified emails.

error.alreadyInList: This item is already in the list.
error.containsLetter: The input value needs at least one letter.
error.containsNumber: The input value needs at least one number.
error.date: This is not a valid date.
error.dateMax: The input value mustn't be later than {{ max }}.
error.dateMin: The input value mustn't be earlier than {{ min }}.
error.dateTime: This is not a valid date with time.
error.defaultIncrementRequired: If "{{ incrementName }}" is set then this attribute must be "Required" too.
error.email: This is not a valid email adress.
error.emailAlreadyInProject: {{ value }} is already in this project.
error.isMultipleOf: The number isn't an integral multiple of {{ multipleOf }}. Do you mean {{ previous }} or {{ next }}?
error.isNumber: The input value is not a number.
error.max: The number mustn't be bigger than {{ max }}.
error.maxItems: There are not more than {{ maxItems }} items allowed.
error.maxLength: The input value is {{ difference }} characters too long.
error.min: The number mustn't be smaller than {{ min }}.
error.min-after-max: "{{ minName }}" must not be after "{{ maxName }}".
error.min-higher-max: "{{ minName }}" must not be higher than "{{ maxName }}".
error.minItems: You must add at least {{ minItems }} items to the list.
error.minLength: The input value is {{ difference }} characters too short.
error.pattern: The input is not matching this pattern: {{ pattern }}
error.regExp: The input is no regular Expression.
error.time: This is not a valid time.
error.timeMax: The input value mustn't be later than {{ max }}.
error.timeMin: The input value mustn't be earlier than {{ min }}.
error.timeMultipleOf: This time isn't an integral multiple of {{ multipleOf }}s.
error.url: This is not a valid URL.

warning.missing-primary-key: It is recommended to specify an unique identifier for each table. You can do this by setting the "Required" and "Unique" validators for one attribute. Most of the time this identifier is an id or name.
